name: ghost-kraken
description: Kraken tests for Ghost 3.41.1 local instance

scripts.test: npm run kk-test && npm run cy-headless && mv cypress/screenshots screenshots/cypress
scripts.kk-test: npm run start-containers && kraken-node run && rm -rf reports/ .kraken
scripts.rs-gh3: docker exec ghost_3.41.1 rm /var/lib/ghost/content/data/ghost.db && docker restart ghost_3.41.1
scripts.rs-gh4: docker exec ghost_4.44.0 rm /var/lib/ghost/content/data/ghost.db && docker restart ghost_4.44.0
scripts.start-containers: npm run rs-gh3 && npm run rs-gh4 && sleep 5s
scripts.cy-headless: npm run start-containers && cypress run --headless && rm -rf cypress/videos

author: Luis Miguel Guzman Perez
